entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING, Akulivik
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:25 p.m. EDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.8Â°C

entry.title: Wednesday night: Blizzard. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Blizzard ending late this evening then snow and blowing snow. Wind northeast 60 km/h gusting to 80 diminishing to 40 gusting to 60 late this evening. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow and blowing snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 19 April 2023
